verses.text: And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Behold, I have \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto your \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in all that ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, and have \w made|strong="H4427"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over you.

And now, behold, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you: and I am \w old|strong="H2204"\w* and \w grayheaded|strong="H7867"\w*; and, behold, my \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add are\add* with you: and I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you from my \w childhood|strong="H5271"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Behold, here I \add am:\add* \w witness|strong="H6030"\w* against me before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and before his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*: whose \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* have I \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*? or whose \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* have I \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*? or whom have I \w defrauded|strong="H6231"\w*? whom have I \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w*? or of whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* have I received \add any\add* \w bribe|strong="H3724"\w* to \w blind|strong="H5956"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* therewith? and I will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* it you.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft bribe: Heb. ransom\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft to blind…: or, that I should hide mine eyes at him\f*

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast not \w defrauded|strong="H6231"\w* us, nor \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* us, neither hast thou \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w ought|strong="H3972"\w* of any \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against you, and his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \add is\add* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that ye have not \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w ought|strong="H3972"\w* in my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \add He is\add* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*.

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add It is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w advanced|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and that \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft advanced: or, made\f*

Now therefore stand \w still|strong="H3320"\w*, that I may \w reason|strong="H8199"\w* with you \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of all the righteous \w acts|strong="H6666"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to you and to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.  +  r 12.7  t righteous…: Heb. righteousnesses, or, benefits *  +  r 12.7  t to: Heb. with *

When \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, which brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and made them \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And when they \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and they \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against them.

And they \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, because we have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w* and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*: but now \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, and \w Bedan|strong="H0917"\w*, and \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, and ye \w dwelled|strong="H3427"\w* \w safe|strong="H0983"\w*.

And when ye \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* against you, ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Nay; but a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over us: when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* your \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Now therefore behold the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* whom ye have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, \add and\add* whom ye have \w desired|strong="H7592"\w*! and, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w set|strong="H5414"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over you.

If ye will \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him, and \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and not \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, then shall both ye and also the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w* over you continue \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:  +  r 12.14  t commandment: Heb. mouth *  +  r 12.14  t continue…: Heb. be after *

But if ye will not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, but \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, then shall the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be against you, as \add it was\add* against your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ Now \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\add Is it\add* not \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and he shall \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* and \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*; that ye may \w perceive|strong="H3045"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that your \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*, which ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in \w asking|strong="H7592"\w* you a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

So \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* and \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Pray|strong="H6419"\w* for thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that we \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not: for we have \w added|strong="H3254"\w* unto all our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \add this\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, to \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* us a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all this \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: yet turn not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, but \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*;

And turn ye not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*: for \add then should ye go\add* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w vain|strong="H8414"\w* \add things\add*, which cannot \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* nor \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*; for they \add are\add* \w vain|strong="H8414"\w*.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will not \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for his \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake: because it hath \w pleased|strong="H2974"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* you his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Moreover as for \w me|strong="H0595"\w*, God \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* that I should \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w ceasing|strong="H2308"\w* to \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* for you: but I will \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* you the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and the \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*:\f + \fr 12.23 \ft in: Heb. from\f*

Only \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: for \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* how great \add things\add* he hath \w done|strong="H1431"\w* for you.\f + \fr 12.24 \ft how…: or, what a great thing\f*
But if ye shall \w still|strong="H7489"\w* do \w wickedly|strong="H7489"\w*, ye shall be \w consumed|strong="H5595"\w*, both ye and your \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.
